summary: This is a set of armour based upon mid 15th century German Gothic armour styles.
descriptionHtml:
///////////////////////////Description///////////////////////////////

This is a set of armour based upon mid 15th century German Gothic armour styles.


//////////////////////////Installation///////////////////////////////

Extract the Meshes folder to C:/...Steam\\SteamApps\\Common\\skyrim\\Data
Extract the textures folder to C:/...Steam\\SteamApps\\Common\\skyrim\\Data
Extract the GothicPlateArmour.esp file to C:/...Steam\\SteamApps\\Common\\skyrim\\Data

When starting Skyrim, click \"Data Files\" and click the box next to \"GothicPlateArmour.esp\" to load the mod.

////////////////////////Acquiring the armour/////////////////////////

To obtain, you must create each piece at a smithing forge where the armour parts are in the Steel section. Making the armour requires you to have the smithing perk \"Advanced armours\".
The armour is also improvable at the workbench.

//////////////////////////////Notes/////////////////////////////////

The armour is a set and as such isn\'t interchangable with other armour sets.
The armour is for male characters only.
It is not compatible with the weight slider ( One size fits all ).


///////////////////////////Software Used///////////////////////////

3ds Max 2012 64Bit

Adobe Photoshop CS2

Nifskope
author: The SH0CKER
